metadata.purpose: Non-circular coverage audit - queries sourced from real user questions, not from reviewing existing content
sources: Reddit/forum discussions on CA business licensing
Government FAQ pages (Alameda County, CDSS, CDE)

query_types.edge_case: Confusing scenarios that trip people up
query_types.out_of_scope: Questions the bot SHOULD decline or redirect

queries.query: Do I need a DBA or an LLC? What's the difference?
queries.expected_coverage: Should explain DBA is just a name registration, LLC is entity formation, and you might need both

queries.query: I work in three different cities as a mobile dog groomer. Do I need a business license from each city?
queries.expected_coverage: Yes, each city requires its own license; tax only on portion of revenue in each

queries.query: What order do I get licenses in? City first or state first?
queries.expected_coverage: Generally: entity formation (state) → EIN (federal) → city business license → industry permits

queries.query: My contractor license expired 4 months ago. Can I just renew it or do I have to start over?
queries.expected_coverage: CSLB allows reinstatement within 5 years with fees; after that, reapply

queries.query: I'm a sole proprietor working from home under my own name. Do I need any licenses at all?
queries.expected_coverage: Still need city business license (Business Tax Certificate), possibly home occupation permit

queries.query: What's the total cost to open a restaurant in California including all permits and licenses?
queries.expected_coverage: Should mention: business license, health permit, ABC license if alcohol, fire inspection, seller's permit, etc.

queries.query: I live in an unincorporated area of the county. Do I still need a business license?
queries.expected_coverage: Yes, from the county; unincorporated areas are county jurisdiction

queries.query: When do I need an EIN number vs just using my SSN?
queries.expected_coverage: EIN required for: employees, certain business types, partnerships; optional for sole props without employees

queries.query: I'm a cosmetologist who wants to add microblading. Do I need a separate license?
queries.expected_coverage: Should explain BBC requirements for esthetician services, separate certification for microblading

queries.query: What's the bond requirement for a contractor license and why do I need it?
queries.expected_coverage: CSLB requires $25,000 contractor bond; protects consumers from contractor default

queries.query: I want to sell homemade candles at farmers markets. What licenses do I need?
queries.expected_coverage: Business license, seller's permit (CDTFA), possibly cottage food exemption doesn't apply to candles

queries.query: How do I transfer my business license to a new owner when I sell my business?
queries.expected_coverage: Most licenses don't transfer; new owner must apply fresh

queries.query: What happens if I forget to renew my business license?
queries.expected_coverage: Penalties, late fees; operating without valid license can result in fines

queries.query: I'm starting a food truck. Do I need a health permit from every county I operate in?
queries.expected_coverage: Mobile Food Facility Permit; some reciprocity between counties but varies

queries.query: What's the difference between a seller's permit and a business license?
queries.expected_coverage: Business license = city tax; seller's permit = state sales tax collection authority

queries.query: Can my LLC get a Type 47 liquor license or does it have to be in my personal name?
queries.expected_coverage: LLCs can hold ABC licenses; all members undergo background check

queries.query: I run an online-only business from California selling to customers nationwide. What CA licenses do I need?
queries.expected_coverage: Still need city business license, seller's permit if selling tangible goods

queries.query: How much does a real estate broker license cost including all the required education?
queries.expected_coverage: DRE fees, required courses, exam fees, E&O insurance

queries.query: I'm a handyman. Do I need a contractor license for small jobs under $500?
queries.expected_coverage: $500 limit (including materials and labor); still need business license

queries.query: What continuing education do I need to renew my cosmetology license?
queries.expected_coverage: BBC CE requirements vary by license type

queries.query: Can I operate a daycare out of my home? What licenses and inspections are required?
queries.expected_coverage: Community Care Licensing, fire clearance, background checks, capacity limits

queries.query: I want to import goods from China to sell in California. What permits do I need beyond a seller's permit?
queries.expected_coverage: Should note this involves federal customs/import law beyond CA state licensing

queries.query: How do I look up if a contractor is properly licensed?
queries.expected_coverage: CSLB license lookup tool, what to verify

queries.query: My HOA says I can't run a business from home. Does that override my home occupation permit?
queries.expected_coverage: HOA covenants are separate from city permits; both must be satisfied

queries.query: What's the penalty for operating without a business license in California?
queries.expected_coverage: Varies by city; typically fines, back taxes, potential cease operations order

kiddobot.description: California childcare subsidy and program questions

queries.query: What's the difference between CalWORKs Stage 1, Stage 2, and Stage 3?
queries.expected_coverage: Stage 1 = receiving cash aid; Stage 2 = transition/stable; Stage 3 = income-based, not entitlement

queries.query: I signed up for the Centralized Eligibility List 6 months ago. Why haven't I heard anything?
queries.expected_coverage: CEL is NOT first-come-first-served; ranked by income and family size; can be year+ wait

queries.query: I make $5,000 a month and have 3 kids. Do I qualify for subsidized childcare?
queries.expected_coverage: Should reference SMI thresholds by family size; $5K/mo for family of 4 is under threshold

queries.query: Can my mom watch my kids and get paid through the subsidy program?
queries.expected_coverage: Yes, Alternative Payment Program allows license-exempt providers including relatives

queries.query: What's the difference between a family fee and a co-payment?
queries.expected_coverage: Family fee = income-based payment to program; co-payment = difference between provider rate and max reimbursement

queries.query: I'm on CalFresh and Medi-Cal. Does that automatically qualify me for childcare assistance?
queries.expected_coverage: Yes, participating in means-tested programs satisfies income eligibility; still need to show 'need'

queries.query: My child has an IEP. Does that help us get childcare faster?
queries.expected_coverage: Children with exceptional needs get priority within same rank; also CHAN program for severely disabled

queries.query: I'm a seasonal farmworker. Is there a special childcare program for me?
queries.expected_coverage: CMIG (Migrant Child Care) and CMAP (Migrant Alternative Payment) programs

queries.query: How do I recertify for childcare assistance? What documents do I need?
queries.expected_coverage: Income verification, continued need documentation, timeline

queries.query: I just got a job but haven't started yet. Can I get childcare while job searching?
queries.expected_coverage: Seeking employment is a valid need; limited duration

queries.query: The childcare provider I want to use charges more than what the program pays. What do I do?
queries.expected_coverage: Family may need to pay co-payment (difference); or choose different provider

queries.query: I'm homeless and need childcare. Are there special provisions for me?
queries.expected_coverage: Homelessness satisfies both income AND need criteria; special priority

queries.query: Can I get help paying for summer camp or just daycare?
queries.expected_coverage: School-age children up to 13 can receive subsidized care including summer programs

queries.query: My income went up. When do I lose my childcare subsidy?
queries.expected_coverage: Families can stay until income exceeds 85% SMI (higher than entry threshold)

queries.query: How do I know if a childcare center is safe and licensed?
queries.expected_coverage: Community Care Licensing lookup; Oliver's Law right to review facility file

queries.query: I'm in school full-time. Does that count as a 'need' for childcare?
queries.expected_coverage: Yes, vocational training or educational program qualifies as need

queries.query: What happens if I get a CPS referral for childcare? Do I go to the front of the line?
queries.expected_coverage: CPS referrals are Priority 1; served first when funding available

queries.query: My child is 14 but has special needs. Can they still get subsidized care?
queries.expected_coverage: Children 13+ with IEP and professional letter can continue in care

queries.query: I applied to 5 different programs. Do they all use the same eligibility list?
queries.expected_coverage: Depends on county; some have unified CEL, others require separate applications

queries.query: What immunizations does my child need for daycare?
queries.expected_coverage: CA required vaccines for childcare; CDPH immunization schedule

queries.query: I have a disability and can't physically care for my child during the day. Does that qualify me?
queries.expected_coverage: Physical/mental incapacity is a valid need category

queries.query: Can I use childcare subsidies for overnight care if I work night shifts?
queries.expected_coverage: Care authorized based on work schedule; some programs cover non-traditional hours

queries.query: I'm a foster parent. What childcare help is available to me?
queries.expected_coverage: Emergency Foster Care Bridge Program; foster children get priority

queries.query: How do I complain about my childcare provider to the state?
queries.expected_coverage: Community Care Licensing complaint process

queries.query: What's the California State Preschool Program and is it different from Head Start?
queries.expected_coverage: CSPP is state-funded preschool; Head Start is federal; different income limits and requirements

waterbot.description: California water quality and safety questions

queries.query: Is my tap water safe to drink? How do I know?
queries.expected_coverage: Check Consumer Confidence Report; public systems must meet MCLs; testing available

queries.query: I have a private well. How do I get it tested and how often should I?
queries.expected_coverage: No state oversight for private wells; homeowner responsibility; annual testing recommended; find certified lab

queries.query: What is PFAS and should I be worried about it in my water?
queries.expected_coverage: PFAS = forever chemicals; health effects; CA monitoring requirements; treatment options

queries.query: My water has a chlorine smell. Is that dangerous?
queries.expected_coverage: Chlorine/chloramine used for disinfection; not dangerous at treatment levels; taste/odor issue

queries.query: I live in a farming community. Should I be worried about nitrates?
queries.expected_coverage: Agricultural areas have elevated nitrate risk; health effects especially for infants; testing recommended

queries.query: What's the difference between a Maximum Contaminant Level and a Public Health Goal?
queries.expected_coverage: PHG = ideal safe level; MCL = enforceable legal limit (may be higher due to cost/tech limits)

queries.query: I got a notice from my water company about a violation. What should I do?
queries.expected_coverage: Read notice carefully; may recommend alternative water source; contact water provider for details

queries.query: My landlord won't tell me about the water quality. What are my rights?
queries.expected_coverage: Landlords must forward water notices to tenants; can request CCR; right to safe water

queries.query: Is hard water bad for my health or just annoying?
queries.expected_coverage: Not a health risk; causes scale buildup, dry skin, appliance damage

queries.query: I think there's lead in my water from old pipes. How do I test for it?
queries.expected_coverage: Lead test ~$50 from certified lab; old plumbing issue not water supply; flush before drinking

queries.query: What water filter should I buy to remove arsenic?
queries.expected_coverage: Reverse osmosis; check NSF certification for specific contaminants; SWRCB approved device list

queries.query: My water system is on the 'failing' list. What does that mean?
queries.expected_coverage: Not meeting Human Right to Water Act standards; may have violations; state working on solutions

queries.query: Who do I complain to if my water looks or smells bad?
queries.expected_coverage: Contact water provider first; if unresolved, State Water Board or local LPA

queries.query: Will boiling my water make it safe if it's contaminated with nitrates?
queries.expected_coverage: NO - boiling concentrates nitrates; only works for bacteria/viruses

queries.query: What is chromium-6 and why was it in the news?
queries.expected_coverage: Industrial pollutant; cancer risk; CA had/has stricter standard; some systems struggle to meet it

queries.query: I'm pregnant. Are there extra precautions I should take with tap water?
queries.expected_coverage: Consult healthcare provider; extra concern for nitrates, lead; consider testing if unsure

queries.query: What's in my Consumer Confidence Report and how do I read it?
queries.expected_coverage: Annual water quality report; shows contaminants detected, levels vs MCL, source info

queries.query: Is bottled water safer than tap water?
queries.expected_coverage: Not necessarily; tap water often more tested; bottled water regulated differently; environmental concerns

queries.query: My water looks cloudy in the morning. Is something wrong?
queries.expected_coverage: Usually air bubbles or temperature; clears after standing; if persistent, may be sediment

queries.query: What's a TMDL and how does it affect my local creek?
queries.expected_coverage: Total Maximum Daily Load; pollution limit for impaired water body; cleanup plan

queries.query: I want to report someone illegally dumping into a storm drain. Who do I call?
queries.expected_coverage: Local water quality agency; Regional Water Board; CalEPA complaint portal

queries.query: Can I get a grant to fix my failing water system? I'm on a small community system.
queries.expected_coverage: State Drinking Water Revolving Fund; SAFER program; technical assistance available

queries.query: What's the difference between the State Water Board and Regional Water Boards?
queries.expected_coverage: State = statewide policy, drinking water; Regional = 9 boards for watershed-specific pollution control

queries.query: I heard my water district uses recycled water. Is that safe to drink?
queries.expected_coverage: Potable reuse is highly treated and regulated; direct vs indirect potable reuse; monitoring requirements

queries.query: After the wildfire, is my tap water safe? I heard about benzene contamination.
queries.expected_coverage: Post-fire water quality concerns are real; follow local advisories; VOC contamination possible from burned infrastructure

queries.query: What is SB 606 and how does it affect my water usage?
queries.expected_coverage: AB 1668/SB 606 Making Conservation a Way of Life; permanent water use standards; supplier water budgets

queries.query: How much water am I allowed to use per day in California?
queries.expected_coverage: Indoor standard is 47 GPCD as of 2025; standards apply to suppliers not individuals; outdoor varies by climate

queries.query: What was the 20 by 2020 water conservation goal?
queries.expected_coverage: SB X7-7 Water Conservation Act of 2009; 20% reduction by 2020; achieved 32% reduction; 199 to 136 GPCD

queries.query: What are the current drought restrictions in California?
queries.expected_coverage: No statewide emergency regulations as of 2025; permanent conservation standards now apply; local restrictions may vary

queries.query: How does my water company calculate my water budget?
queries.expected_coverage: Urban Water Use Objectives; indoor + outdoor + water loss + CII budgets; custom per supplier; annual reporting

queries.query: What is Save Our Water and how do I participate?
queries.expected_coverage: DWR campaign; rebate finder; conservation tips; SaveOurWater.com

queries.query: What's the difference between drought restrictions and permanent conservation rules?
queries.expected_coverage: Emergency vs permanent framework; drought restrictions are temporary; AB 1668/SB 606 standards are permanent

queries.query: When does California start enforcing water use limits?
queries.expected_coverage: Regulation effective Jan 2025; graduated enforcement; penalties start Nov 2027; $1000-$10000 per day

queries.query: What rebates are available for water-saving appliances in California?
queries.expected_coverage: Toilet, washer, showerhead rebates; turf removal; smart controllers; SaveOurWater.com rebate finder

queries.query: What does water use efficiency mean for California homeowners?
queries.expected_coverage: Indoor 47 GPCD standard; outdoor ET-based budgets; rate impacts; available incentives
